description: This file defines a Spring Data JPA repository interface for Retailer entities, allowing basic CRUD operations and a custom method to find a Retailer by name.

classes.name: RetailerRepository
classes.description: A repository interface for performing database operations on Retailer entities, extending JpaRepository for standard CRUD methods and custom finder method.

methods.name: findByName
methods.description: Finds a Retailer entity by its name, returning an Optional containing the Retailer if found.
